00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlModelStateNode - MRML node to represent the properties of a model.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // ModelState nodes save the properties of a model inside a Slicer scene. They
00017 // can also be used for model groups.
00018 
00019 #ifndef __vtkMrmlModelStateNode_h

00032   vtkTypeMacro(vtkMrmlModelStateNode,vtkMrmlNode);

00034   
00035   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036   // Utility Functions
00037   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------

00040   // Write the node's attributes to a MRML file in XML format

00047   // Description:
00048   // ID of the referenced model
00049   vtkSetStringMacro(ModelRefID);

00051   
00052   // Description:
00053   // Visibility
00054   vtkBooleanMacro(Visible,int);

00056   vtkGetMacro(Visible,int);
00057   
00058   // Description:
00059   // Visibility of the opacity slider
00060   // This is not used in Slicer, but only saved to maintain compatibility
00061   // with SPLViz
00062   vtkBooleanMacro(SliderVisible,int);
00063   vtkSetMacro(SliderVisible,int);
00064   vtkGetMacro(SliderVisible,int);
00065   
00066   // Description:
00067   // Visibility of the children (for model groups)
00068   vtkBooleanMacro(SonsVisible,int);
00069   vtkSetMacro(SonsVisible,int);
00070   vtkGetMacro(SonsVisible,int);
00071   
00072   // Description:
00073   // Opacity
00074   vtkSetMacro(Opacity,float);
00075   vtkGetMacro(Opacity,float);
00076 
00077   // Description:
00078   // Is clipping active?
00079   vtkBooleanMacro(Clipping,int);
00080   vtkSetMacro(Clipping,int);
00081   vtkGetMacro(Clipping,int);
00082   
00083   // Description:
00084   // Is backface culling active?
00085   vtkBooleanMacro(BackfaceCulling,int);
00086   vtkSetMacro(BackfaceCulling,int);
00087   vtkGetMacro(BackfaceCulling,int); 
00088   
00089

00095
